news.title: Malaysia's Nuren Group to List Shares in Australia's Stock Exchange
news.description: Malaysia's Nuren Group, which operates a digital platform for women in parenting, education and maternity wellness, is seeking to launch its initial public offering (IPO) on the National Stock Exchange of Australia. Set to debut at A$0.20 per share, the company is looking at a mid-July 2024 listing. The market for parenting tech is experiencing unprecedented growth, driven by increasing awareness and demand for convenient, effective and personalised care solutions. The global parenting spending market, encompassing baby care products, childcare services, education technology, and parenting apps, is valued at several hundred billion dollars annually and is expected to continue growing significantly. Nuren aims to upgrade its technological offerings by integrating an AI-powered parenting chat into the Motherhood SuperApp. This presents a tremendous opportunity to capitalise on the expanding market and meet the evolving needs of modern families.

news.title: Mothers are Women, Too!
news.description: Women’s spending power is on the rise. Women manage multiple roles and being a mother is just the tip of the iceberg. Financial provider, spouse, teacher, chef, counsellor are all the other roles she manages in parallel. Based on Nuren Group’s 2023 research on Malaysians’ Digital Habits & Trends, women were found to be the bigger spenders compared to men, with 90% going on online sprees at least once a week. Another survey by Nuren Group, Finance Trends in Malaysia Survey Report 2024, revealed that 67% of women are taking charge when it comes to making financial decisions for themselves as well as their family. Embrace this power of women’s consumerism, contact https://rebrand.ly/media-enquiry to explore how your brand can thrive in this environment.

news.title: Parenting Platform Nuren Group's 10 Year Journey, SuperApp & IPO Plans
news.description: Roshan Kanesan speaks with Nuren Group’s CEO Petrina Goh and Creative Director Maton Shukor, to learn the story behind the company’s birth and 10 year journey, the rationale and business value of building a superapp, and what’s next for this company. 10 years in, Nuren has over 5 million users, 15 million monthly views, and launched their Parenting SuperApp by Motherhood earlier this year. All this has helped generate RM50 million revenue in the last 3 years.

news.title: Nuren Group Unveils Winners At Motherhood Choice Awards 2023
news.description: 7,000 Malaysian Moms Speak, 100 Parenting Brands Shine. Motherhood.com.my celebrated a roster of over 100 exceptional brands at the Motherhood Choice Awards 2023. With more than 130,000 votes from participating voters, Motherhood Choice Awards 2023 proudly announce 100 brands that made important contributions to the world of motherhood and parenting, offering valuable products and services that cater to the unique needs and challenges of raising children.

news.title: Nuren Group Forms Alliance With Confinement Centers To Improve Postnatal Care
news.description: Nuren Group has formed a strategic alliance with like-minded industry leaders to support mothers and children in the aspect of health, education, and livelihood. This announcement comes on the heels of the establishment of Malaysia’s first Multi Brand Confinement Group which aims to establish the Motherhood Care+ Program. Motherhood Care+ Program will include a series of community-driven events such as antenatal classes, parenting workshops, health & well-being workouts, spiritual activities, and support groups for Mothers by Mothers.

news.title: Aplikasi Parenting SuperApp By Motherhood Tawar Bantuan Tentang Kehamilan, Keibuan, Penjagaan Anak
news.description: Nuren Group telah melancarkan Parenting SuperApp by Motherhood yang merupakan aplikasi mudah alih yang menyediakan ibu dengan penyelesaian sehenti untuk semua keperluan keibubapaan mereka melalui maklumat dan kandungan yang berkaitan dengan kehamilan, keibuan, penjagaan anak. SuperApp ini juga menawarkan pelbagai Program Komuniti, webinar dan bengkel yang merangkumi semua keperluan antenatal, keibubapaan dan kanak-kanak. Selain itu, ia melangkaui kandungan digital sahaja, menawarkan pelbagai aktiviti Superkids atas talian dan luar talian.

news.title: Homegrown Female Entrepreneurs Powering Growth of Ecommerce Biz
news.description: Ecommerce industry has become a fertile ground for businesswomen to thrive in the digital market. Whether it is retail or beauty, food or financial services, female entrepreneurs are taking centre stage with their innovative creations and ideas. One such individual would be the CEO and co-founder of Nuren Group, Petrina Goh, who took inspiration from a challenging pregnancy and motherhood experience to establish the e-marketplace Motherhood.com.my in her mission to curate a one-stop platform for new mothers.

news.slug: 网络平台育儿心得 Motherhood 帮新手爸妈
news.title: 借力网络平台集合育儿心得 Motherhood 帮轻新手爸妈
news.description: 作为一家见证女性几大重要阶段的 Nuren Group，她们旗下的 Motherhood 主要关注新手爸妈的孕程及育儿。你想象过吗？除了在后疫情时代仍然冒着感染冠病的风险逛商场；如今借助科技之便，母婴产品也能上架电商平台，让作为新手爸妈的你也能在一站式线上商铺找到所有类别的母婴品项。本期节目，Nuren Group 执行长，Petrina 吴诗茵将告诉我们，在妈咪宝贝的消费逻辑中，什么环节最为重要

news.slug: Nuren-集团2022年100个母亲喜爱的育儿品牌-MCA
news.title: 资讯｜Nuren 集团宣布 2022 年100个母亲喜爱的育儿品牌 (MCA)
news.description: 2022 年母亲喜爱的育儿品牌 (MCA) 颁奖典礼上颁布了100多个品牌。由于疫情原因，2021年的颁奖被迫中断，而今年的第三届MCA颁奖仪式标志着这一享有盛誉的颁奖典礼的回归，也充满了对即将到来的一年里妈妈们的展望。今年的颁奖典礼主要是为了表彰那些在帮助母亲和妇女度过母亲生活做出贡献的优秀品牌和创新的品牌。从5月1日到9月16日，通过为期4个月的投票，全国5000多名妈妈投票选出了今年的提名，并从中选出了她们最信任和喜爱的品牌作为获奖者。

news.title: For Mothers, By Mothers: Nuren Group Announces 100 Winning Parenting Brands at Motherhood Choice Awards 2022
news.description: Motherhood Choice Awards 2022 announces over 100 winning brands, including Manulife, Clearblue, Ayam Brand, BZU BZU and Bio Oil, that have prioritised innovation in its products for Malaysian mothers. The prizes and nominations were determined by over 133,864 votes from over 5,000 Malaysian mothers over the period of 4 months. The ceremony also celebrated the soft launch of the Motherhood’s latest Parenting application known as The Parenting SuperApp by Motherhood. The event also honoured 25 Supermum influencers for their heartwarming contributions to bringing Motherhood’s community closer and stronger.

news.title: Nuren Group Meraikan 100 Pemenang Jenama Keibubapaan
news.description: Motherhood.com.my, platform keibubapaan nombor satu di Malaysia yang menawarkan pelbagai sumber untuk ibu dan bakal ibu di bawah Nuren Group, telah menghargai lebih 100 jenama semasa Motherhood Choice Awards 2022, satu majlis anugerah yang ditubuhkan untuk mengiktiraf jenama-jenama bayi dan ibu yang paling selamat dan inovatif di pasaran Malaysia.

news.title: 粉红社：做女人生意不容易
news.description: 创业不如想象中简单,一路上面临人才,现金流和生意模式问题。吴诗茵接受《中国报》专访时分享女人集团如何在七年内建立团队,扩充东南亚业务,以及放眼未来三年展开IPO

news.title: Glued to Social Media: Nuren Group Finds Out Where Mothers Are Turning To For Info and Advice, In Latest Digital Survey Report
news.description: According to digital survey 2022 conducted by Nuren Group, 82% of savvy millennial mothers rely on social media for maternity & parental info and advice. The full digital report is made available for public to download. As a media platform that is committed to empowering mothers, Motherhood.com.my hopes to continue in driving conversations around this topic to unearth more information and insights, that will help businesses and brands to know better how to reach out to and connect with digital mums.

news.title: Facebook, Instagram & Youtube Adalah Pilihan 72% Ibu Di Malaysia Untuk Ketahui Tips Kesejahteraan Keluarga
news.description: Satu tinjauan telah dilaksanakan oleh Nuren Group bagi mengetahui corak penggunaan atas-talian para ibu milenium selepas pandemik berlaku dan hasilnya mendapati bahawa 82% ibu telah beralih ke media sosial semasa masa lapang mereka dan 38% daripadanya menggunakan telefon pintar lebih daripada 6 jam sehari. Melihat lanjut ke atas tabiat para ibu ini, dalam beberapa jam penggunaan telefon pintar, laporan itu mendapati bahawa 72% ibu menggunakannya untuk mencari petua mengenai ‘parenting‘ dan kehamilan, 70% ibu mengakses apa-apa maklumat mengenai anak-anak, 45% ibu yang lain melihat kandungan yang melibatkan nyahkotak produk. Dan antara platform yang kerap dikunjungi para ibu adalah Facebook, Instagram dan Youtube.

news.title: Survey: Malaysian millennial mums turned to social media for info, advice throughout pandemic
news.description: Nuren Group, a motherhood community and e-commerce platform, recently published the findings from surveys conducted between January and March, surveyed over 2000 Malaysian mothers across the nation, with the aim of further understanding the changes in mothers' consumption patterns and behaviours on the internet and social media. By sharing this digital report to public, the company hopes business and brands can better discover insights such as online content consumption, interest group and information source of millennial mums.

news.title: Tech for Mothers
news.description: Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer Petrina Goh founded Nuren with her husband in 2013, after working for five years with CIMB’s proprietary investment arm. We explore more as we speak to Petrina, one of Southeast Asia’s Top 50 Rising Women In Tech 2021.

news.title: How I Work It: The Tech CEO and Mother of Two Who Is In The Business of Parenting
news.description: Former investment banker and Nuren Group CEO Petrina Goh gets real about the lonesome realities of entrepreneurship and the blurred lines of work-life balance, having started a business inspired by her own parenting journey. Recently named by TechNode Global as one of Southeast Asia's top 50 rising women in tech 2021, Goh reveals the biggest takeaways from her entrepreneurial journey, how she overcame postpartum depression and why it's vital for working mums to have a community of like-minded women behind them.

news.title: Mother Knows Best: Nuren Group Announces Winners Of Motherhood Choice 2021
news.description: Motherhood Choice 2021, an award ceremony established to recognise the safest and most innovative mother and baby brands in the Malaysian market, has announced more than 100 top voted brands through a virtual awards event on Sunday. Over 6,000 parents from the local parenting communities have banded together to recognise over 700 trusted brands for their outstanding products and services in baby and parenting industry.

news.slug: 资讯社区电商育儿指南平台
news.title: 整合资讯、社区与电商服务　全方位育儿指南平台
news.description: 本地新创平台Motherhood.com.my致力为新手妈妈们提供全面指南，让当妈这件事变得不艰难！作为本地网站，除了强调本土化资讯，平台亦讲求准确性。针对女人商机，女人集团首席执行员兼联合创办人吴诗茵说，“女性比起男性更容易出现情绪化消费，尤其是妈妈。很多女性在当妈妈后，购物重点都会放在孩子身上。”

news.title: Southeast Asia’s Top 50 Rising Women in Tech 2021
news.description: Southeast Asia has seen its fair share of unicorns & successful startups that have female founders or are led by women. These female entrepreneurs and C-suite executives are bringing their industry expertise, stints on both VCs and corporates, and in some cases, family and working ties to their startups. TechNode Global has put together a list of top emerging women-led startups in Southeast Asia, with a focus on early-stage ventures with funding rounds (up to Series B) since January 1, 2019.

news.slug: 东南亚女性社区生育育儿指南
news.title: 东南亚最大型女性社区 提供最全面生育和育儿指南
news.description: 专属会员资格 尽享更多优惠。除了媒体市场平台，签购New Mom Privileges、Superkids Club、MamaCubaTry、或Ibuencer.com专属会员资格的育儿社区会员和她们的孩子，也将享有众多好处——妈妈和孩子们可凭这些会员资格成为Motherhood.com.my社区的一份子。该社区通过多种正在进行的免费活动增进妈妈和孩子之间的关系，并且提供独家优惠。

news.title: Motherhood: Aplikasi khusus keluarga dan kanak-kanak
news.description: Small excerpt from Utusan Malaysia, recognizing Motherhood.com.my as a leading parenting platform in Malaysia. Do you know that Motherhood also has BM content? On top of that, we also have our kids series known as Tahukah Si Manja, that creates informative video content for our little ones, keeping them entertained and occupied during MCO.

news.title: Nuren Group provides A-Z Guide on motherhood and parenting
news.description: Each stage of a woman’s life, from getting married to becoming a mother and raising a family, is seen as an important milestone and incredibly life-changing. Nuren Group, Southeast Asia's largest one-stop centre for female-centric content, community and commerce platforms understands this and aims to be a holistic guide for women and walk them through important moments in their life, including pregnancy and motherhood.

news.title: Nuren endears itself to women with solutions on marriage, motherhood and parenting
news.description: Home-grown startup Nuren Group is leveraging on women’s hunger for knowledge and solutions on marriage, motherhood and parenting to cultivate a passionate following on its online platform. The company aims to expand its regional footprints, make baby products more accessible to mothers, and help local emerging brands to expand overseas.

news.title: Motherhood.com.my braves 2021 with more advertisers on board
news.description: The pandemic might have posed a challenge to many industries, but Nuren Group – the media owner of Motherhood.com.my – is soaring high. In fact, the Group closed the 2020 financial year on a high note, emerging as a 360-degree media service provider for hundreds of new major clients. Nuren Group successfully leverages on the positive turn of the pandemic to create more award-winning opportunities for its clientele.

news.title: MDV Speed Read with Nuren Group
news.description: Nuren was founded by power couple Petrina and Kelvin Leow back in September 2013. However, the story of how the idea of creating Nuren first came about could not have been more relatable especially for married and soon-to-be-married couples out there.

news.title: Scott’s reached 2 million mums via Ibuencer from Rainbow Gummies Virtual Launch
news.description: More than ever, businesses need to stay resilient. We need to change our mindset as we explore ways to build successful campaigns with quality reach and amplify brand awareness. Via Ibuencer, Scott’s engaged with influencers with children of 5 years old and above including celebrity mumpreneur of two, Yasmin Hani Richardson, who shared her own experience with her little ones, via a live recording session on social media.

news.title: Nuren Group Receives RSFRF Funding from MDV
news.description: Nuren Group is selected as part of first cohort of technology startups to receive 13.75 million in cumulative financing under MDV’s TSFRF programme. The programme was introduced by MDV with support from Ministry of Science Technology & Innovation (MOSTI) and Ministry of Finance (MOF) by offering up to 100 million in funds for VC-based technology startups that are impacted by the COVID-19 outbreak.

news.title: Celebrating Mother’s Day amid Covid-19
news.description: Amidst Covid-19 and MCO, Motherhood has embarked on remote shooting of its Mother’s day video by collaborating with its community of supermoms and sharing real footages of their inspiring, heart-warming moments.

news.title: From Wedding Bells to Baby Cradles with Nuren Group & Petrina Goh
news.description: Cover Story for this month. Nuren Group Co-founder & CEO, Petrina Goh, talks to Malaysia SME Magazine 'Pillars' about creating a wonderful motherhood journey and how it is a little easier through her Nuren Group's mother-centric community and commerce platforms. Read the full interview story on Malaysia SME September 2019 Issue.

news.title: Motherhood Iktiraf 40 Jenama Pilihan Ibu Bapa Di Malaysia
news.description: Setelah undian membabitkan lebih 500,00 pengguna, Motherhood.com.my mengumumkan lebih 40 jenama terkenal menerima anugerah ‘Motherhood Choice 2019” yang menjadi pilihan ibu bapa di Malaysia. Anugerah itu diwujudkan bagi mempamerkan jenama dan produk berkualiti tinggi yang paling inovatif dan terbaik yang ada dalam pasaran ibu dan bayi. Ia juga cara yang baik untuk ibu-ibu untuk berkongsi maklum balas mereka dan pendapat mengenai produk dan perkhidmatan yang mereka telah cuba, uji dan dipercayai.

news.title: Keynote Sharing at SME Biznet 2019 #khabarbaik
news.description: Catch CEO Petrina Goh, live at SME Biznet 2019, happening at Menara TM. Petrina share her entrepreneurial story and how to best use digital and technology to achieve exponential growth. This event is organized by Telekom Malaysia, as part of #khabarbaik nationwide series.

news.title: Motherhood Choice Awards 2019 Iktiraf Barangan Pilihan Untuk Bayi
news.description: Pelancaran kempen ‘Motherhood Choice Awards 2019’ sebagai tanda pengiktirafan jenama barangan bayi pilihan utama ibu bapa di negara ini. Pengasas dan Ketua Pegawai Eksekutif Nuren Group, Petrina Goh menjelaskan, kempen itu bertujuan memberi ganjaran dan meraikan pemain industri barangan bayi yang telah memberikan sumbangan positif kepada komuniti ibu.

news.title: Nestle Unveils Official Brand Page with Motherhood Malaysia
news.description: Malaysian mom-focused platform Motherhood.com.my, announced today on the launch of Official Brand Page. This event saw Nestle Malaysia unveiled as Motherhood's first official brand partner. With this feature, Nestle is now able to combine strength to create stronger brand loyalty and audience awareness. Motherhood is targeting to reach 30 official brand partners by end of 2019.

news.title: Signing of MoU between Nuren Group and OrphanCare
news.description: Nuren Group announced the signing of MoU betwen Motherhood.com.my's ParentCraft programme and OrphanCare Foundation - an NGO that gives institutionalized children and unwanted babies the opportunity to grow up in the care of loving family. With this partnership, OrphanCare will add a new dimension to ParentCraft workshop - a series of antenatal classes that educates and guide mothers on their childcare journey.

news.title: MVCA Most Outstanding Women Entrepreneur 2018
news.description: Petrina Goh, Founder & CEO of Nuren Group is awarded Most Outstanding Women Entrepreneur 2018 by Malaysian Venture Capital & Private Equity Association (MVCA). This recognition is announced during MVCA Annual Dinner & Award Night held in Sime Darby Convention Centre, Kuala Lumpur. This marks a major achievement for Nuren Group's journey to become the leading female community platform in South East Asia.

news.title: Nuren Group Secures Additional Funding from MDV, Innoven & 500 TukTuks
news.description: Nuren Group announced today that they have completed their Series A+ financing round, raising an undisclosed amount from Malaysia Debt Ventures Bhd (MDV), InnoVen Capital and 500 TukTuks. As of today, Nuren Group has presence in three key markets, with their community now includes 2.5 million Southeast Asian mothers, 1.2 million monthly users, and 6 million monthly page views.

news.title: 4 Malaysian Entrepreneur Couples Reveal The Behind-The-Scenes Of Their Office Romances
news.description: In the spirit of Valentine’s Day, our co-founders Petrina and Kelvin open up about what it’s like to work professionally together, who most probably see each other on a daily basis, and also face up to all of the nitty-gritty of being in loves in the office. Click links below to read Kelvin’s responses to the interview questions.

news.title: Nuren Group in the Top 12 “Best Start-Up” of this year’s Jumpstarter
news.description: Nuren Group a Malaysia-based platform that provides new mothers in MY, SG and TH the latest products and knowledge about parenting was one of the 72 startups invited to showcase their products and services. 12 HK based startups and 12 from outside the city competed for “Best Start-Up” distinction in four categories: smart city, retail, advanced technology and financial services.

news.title: Start Up Story by Big Mo Media: Petrina Goh
news.description: “As a woman myself, I know we face with a lot of pain points and that’s when I founded Nuren. I wanted us to be a platform where we can be with these women whose going through the different stages in life to help solve their challenges.” Read more about Petrina’s startup journey at the link below.

news.title: eCommerce: Revitalising conventional forms of trade in Malaysia
news.description: Another thriving Malaysian startup is the Nuren Group, the largest female engagement platform in Southeast Asia. Guiding women through their journeys of wedding and motherhood, Nuren Group operates content-driven marketplaces, which enable thousands of small, medium, and large global brands to sell their products and services. On top of that, they also run digital content and activation campaigns with their community of female influencers and celebrities.

news.title: Panel Discussion: Women in eCommerce Entrepreneurship
news.description: Catch Petrina Goh - CEO of Nuren Group, live on a panel discussion on topic "Women in eCommerce Entrepreneurship". The event - eCommerce Entrepreurship Summit was held on October 11-12 at Palace of The Golden Horses, organized by Malaysiakini.com. Catch Petrina is sharing the same stage as Kelly Lee of Pgeon, Joanna Ho of HappyBunch, Xinch from Storehub and Jonathan Lee fro MaGIC.

news.title: Keynote Sharing at Malaysia Entrepreneur Convention
news.description: Catch CEO Petrina Goh, live at Malaysia Entreprenuer Convention (MEC), happening at Connexion @ Nexus, Bangsar South. Petrina shared her inspiring journey to success and impart tips and advice to budding entrepreneurs who want to take their success to the next level!

news.title: E-Services: The Wedding Helper
news.description: Petrina Goh started a bubble tea shop in 2011, when everyone seemed to be lining up to buy the stuff. But it was just not successful. Two years later, she founded Wedding.com.my, and in 2016, she expanded the business into Motherhood.com.my. Read the full entrepreneurship journey at The Edge Malaysia.

news.slug: 一站式网站-列马新泰2千供应商-WEDDING筹办婚礼好帮手
news.title: 一站式网站．列马新泰2千供应商．WEDDING筹办婚礼好帮手
news.description: 女人集团（Nuren）旗下的Wedding.com.my，是目前马来西亚最大的筹备婚礼一站式服务网络平台，网站内列出了多达2000个来自马来西亚、新加坡和泰国的各类婚礼相关服务供应商的名单与简介，包括婚纱晚装、化妆服务、婚纱婚礼摄影、婚礼场地、自助餐供应商、结婚蛋糕、喜帖印制及司仪服务等，以及各类不同的婚宴策划概念，供客户参考选择。

news.title: Nuren Group wins APICTA International Awards 2017
news.description: Nuren Group represented Malaysia in 17th APICTA International Awards, and won 1st Merit Award under the Start-Up Category. APICTA Award, popularly dubbed as Oscar of ICT in APAC region was held from 7-10th December in Dhaka. This award is designed to stimulate ICT innovation and recognizes successful entrepreneurs among 17 countries. Earlier in October, Nuren Group won Best Startup in Malaysia Chapter's APICTA Awards.

news.title: Nuren Group says "I do" to Thailand Market
news.description: Malaysia-based wedding and baby e-commerce platform Nuren Group today announced the launch of wedding platform Risawedding.com, marking the company’s first entry to the Thailand market. Currently focusing on Bangkok, Risawedding is also looking to expand to Chiang Mai, Pattaya and Phuket.

news.title: 15 Exciting Startups from Malaysia that Raised Funds in 2016
news.description: Nuren Group is among 14 Malaysian startups that earned investors' vote of confidence in 2016 and are doing promising work. Nuren operates ecommerce sites in Malaysia and Singapore that simplifies the whole planning process for brides-to-be.

news.title: Nuren Group to Revolutionize Online Marketplace
news.description: Nuren Group, a Malaysian-based company that runs community and e-Commerce sites for women, is targeting 20% growth on a monthly basis and aims to increase the number of vendors both offline and online website this year. CEO Petrina Goh said this is on top of plans to boost its ties with the local Malay community via stronger relationships with vendors and customers.

news.title: INTI's Outstanding Alumni Award
news.description: Petrina Goh, CEO of Nuren Group was nominated as Inti Alumni Young Entrepreneur of the Year Award 2016. During award presentation ceremony at Inti's 30th Anniversary celebration event, Petrina credited the award to Wedding.com.my and Motherhood.com.my core team, who worked tirelessly to bring the company and brand where they are today.

news.slug: 结婚生育居家生活-女人集团瞄准3人生大事
news.title: 结婚丶生育丶居家生活·女人集团瞄准3人生大事
news.description: 从25万令吉创业本金到筹获200万美元（约807万令吉）资金，Nuren集团只用了3年时间，这在创始（Startup）公司融资环境相对保守的大马而言，并非易事。 本期《一盘生意》访问了平均年龄36.5岁的婚庆及母婴网络平台创业团队，畅谈创办人“集资”秘笈及创业背后的故事及如何布局拓展东南亚市场。

news.title: Making Headway in Equity Crowdfunding
news.description: Initiative proves sceptics and critics wrong with first batch of issuers having achieved promising feats. Nuren Group announced the launch of its on June 3. The initial target was reached within a minute of the offer going live. “Being a consumer-driven business, the offering aims to bring on board retail investors – leveraging their wealth of experience and knowledge to add value to the company." said Petrina Goh

news.title: BFM 89.9 - Malaysia's First Successful Equity Crowdfunding Campaign
news.description: Nuren Group launched the first Malaysian Venture Capital Quality Equity Crowdfunding (ECF) offer recently. Within first few seconds of the launching, Nuren Group has received overwhelming response and raised RM300,000. Petrina and Kelvin share their experience during the ECF campaign.

news.title: Thailand, Philippines Next Up for Nuren Group
news.description: Petrina Goh, co-founder of Nuren Group, says that the company is planning to expand beyond Malaysia and Singapore after capturing 2 million dollars in series A funding recently. She also tells Bloomberg TV Malaysia’s Cynthia Ng why the company will remain female-centric for the near-term.

news.title: When Crowdfunding Offer Surpasses Target In 38 Seconds
news.description: NUREN Group announced the public launch of its venture capital (VC) quality Crowdo equity crowdfunding (ECF) offer with a target of RM200,000 in Petaling Jaya last Friday. The targeted fundraising was achieved within 38 seconds of the offer going live at 10am on Friday. /“The ECF aims to bring on board retail investors, leveraging their wealth of experience and knowledge to add value to the company./” Petrina Goh said.

news.title: Malaysia-based Nuren Group raises $2M for wedding and parenting
news.description: Nuren Group, a Malaysian-based company that runs community and e-commerce sites for women, has raised a $2 million Series A led by Gobi Partners. The capital will be used for hiring and to add more services and e-commerce features to Wedding.com.my and Nuren.sg, Nuren’s wedding sites, and its upcoming parenting marketplace Motherhood.com.my. Combined with its seed round, Nuren’s Series A brings its total raised to $2.25 million.

news.title: Malaysia-based Nuren Group raises $2M for wedding and parenting
news.description: Nuren is a female-dedicated content, community and e-commerce platform. The group operates e-commerce platforms for weddings Wedding.com.my (Malaysia) and Nuren.sg (Singapore), in addition to Motherhood.com.my, where users can discover ideas, find vendors and shop online. The startup takes a content and community approach to e-commerce, allowing users to interact, engage and share ideas with one another.

news.title: 为发展婚礼和教育网站，马来西亚Nuren Group筹资200万美元
news.description: Nuren从成立开始，已为30万对情侣提供服务，让他们与1500个供应商建立联系。其声称Wedding.com.my是马来西亚的顶级婚礼平台，与此同时，Nuren.sg在新加坡也占据了第三的位置。 该公司由其首席行政长官Petrina Goh，首席技术官Kelvin Leow，首席运营官Stacey Lee和首席问题官Alice Ong在2013年成立。 目前他们仅为新加坡和马来西亚提供服务，但是在接下来的两到三年，他们将在更多的东南亚国家开展业务。

news.title: Going places and making money
news.description: Speaking to DEALSTREETASIA, Petrina Goh, CEO and co-founder, Nuren Group, said that the company is planning to expand into Thailand, Indonesia and the Philippines in the next three to five years. Currently, the firm has operations in Malaysia and Singapore. we think that there is a growing middle class in these countries, and these countries are emerging markets and we think that there are a lot of awareness and spending in terms of wedding products, services and motherhood and baby products.

news.title: Saying 'I do' To Online Bridal Services
news.description: Couples in Southeast Asia are probably as hooked on the internet as they are on each other. Can the wedding industry keep up with the cyber-savvy brides and grooms? Wedding.com.my estimates that the websites of more than half of the bridal vendors in the country lack ecommerce functions and are updated only sporadically. This gap is where online wedding marketplaces play matchmaker between cyber savvy consumers and tech-inept businesses.

news.title: 7 Exciting eCommerce Heading Jakarta
news.description: Nuren, the regional brand name of Malaysia-based Wedding.com.my is a content, commerce, and community portal for brides-to-be seeking wedding inspiration and vendors. In the cutthroat wedding industry, many customers end up spending more than they can afford for their big day, landing them in debt. So, Nuren was created to help couples discover inspiration, search for vendors, and shop online through a visual search engine.

news.slug: 站在趋势风口，跟随风而起舞-Wedding-com-my
news.title: 站在趋势风口，跟随风而起舞 － Wedding.com.my
news.description: 结婚，是每个女性梦寐以求的一瞬间。而一个完美的婚礼，就是一位女性人生当中最完美的时刻。然则，当女性打算走入婚姻殿堂的时候，她却会发现：玲琅满目的各种服务往往会让新人不知所措。所幸，在马来西亚，有这么一个网站：它为女性的婚礼提供了一站式服务，为那些正在计划“大日子”而在苦苦搜索婚礼创意，灵感和最复杂细节等等的新人们，提供一个最专业的婚庆行业垂直交流平台。它，就是wedding.com.my。

news.slug: 缘订今生-2015婚纱美容展-媒体伙伴-Wedding-com-my
news.title: 《缘订今生 ．2015婚纱美容展》媒体伙伴 - Wedding.com.my
news.description: 由《囍》及《风采》杂志联手主办的囍《缘订今生 ．2015婚纱美容展》，不知不觉已迈入了第11届年关，这些年一路走来，见证了成千上万的新人步入婚纱殿堂，展开幸福的生活旅程。

news.title: 2015年《我们结婚啦！》第一回合遴选
news.description: 2015“我們結婚啦！”浪漫新人競賽第一回合遴選活動開始啦，這次共有14對新人的結婚照入圍這次的競賽，同時讀者可以開始參與第一回合投選活動，選出心目中最浪漫的結婚照。

news.title: BFM 89.9 - Wedding.com.my
news.description: Launched in September 2013 as a platform that compiles wedding-related stories and bridge the wedding vendors to couples. There are a total of 300,000 weddings in a year and Wedding.com.my tries to capture a slice of the RM7 billion industry in Malaysia.

news.title: 10 Startups in Asia to Watch on Techlist
news.description: Here’s 10 startups to watch on Techlist. Techlist is currently tracking more than 2,600 startups in Asia and adding hundreds more each week. Enjoy the list！

news.slug: 2015-我們結婚啦-浪漫新人競賽報名
news.title: 2015年《我們結婚啦！》浪漫新人競賽開始接受報名
news.description: 2015年《我們結婚啦！》浪漫新人競賽已經開始接受報名啦！於今年結婚的准新人們，只要呈上浪漫婚照，就有機會贏取豐富獎金獎品！

news.title: Malaysia’s Wedding.com.my Gets $274k to Empower Brides Across Southeast Asia
news.description: Malaysian online wedding portal Wedding.com.my today announced the raising of MYR 1M (US$274,000) in a seed funding round led by Kathrein Ventures and joined by N Capital Partners and an angel investor.

news.title: Couples Take Challenge To Discourage Eating Shark’s Fin Soup
news.description: ABOUT 34 couples dressed in full bridal regalia took part in the Shark Savers Couple Challenge, to save sharks. This challenge was part of the awareness campaign “I’m Finished with Fins”, organised by WildAid Shark Savers Malaysia in collaboration with wedding portal Wedding.com.my to encourage Malaysians to swear off shark’s fin soup consumption.

news.slug: 34对情侣護鯊挑战2万大奖‧穿婚纱参赛推广我不翅
news.title: 34對情侶護鯊挑戰2萬大獎‧穿婚紗參賽推廣我不翅
news.description: 护鲨情侶挑战赛开跑！34对情侣身穿婚纱参与Wedding.com.my与非政府组织野生救援协会（Wildaid）旗下保护鲨鱼行动主辦的护鲨比賽，推广并提高国人不吃魚翅的醒觉，以及保护鲨魚的意识。

news.slug: 穿婚纱甜蜜闯关-35对新人寻宝护鲨
news.title: 穿上婚纱甜蜜闯关　35对「新人」寻宝护鯊
news.description: 配合「我不翅了」（I'm FINished with FINs）运动，由婚礼供应商平台Wedding.com.my及非营利组织「护鯊行动」联合举办、《东方日报》为合作媒体的「情侣护鯊大挑战」，今日在One City展开，提醒民眾保护濒临绝种的鯊鱼。

news.title: Social Media Influence in E-Commerce
news.description: Husband and wife team Kelvin Leow and Petrina Goh prefer to call their B2B2C wedding-related website a social commerce site. Marrying the concept of e-commerce with social feedback.

news.title: 创业不简单
news.description: 婚庆网首席执行员吴诗茵:2013年9月，我踏上了创业路，与两个合伙人创立了马来西亚第一个婚庆网。

news.title: 18 Malaysian Startups Poised to Breakout in 2015
news.description: Despite taking two steps backward after a step forward, Malaysian startups have shown their resilience and innovation – several have proven themselves to be a step above the rest, and Tech in Asia has taken note of them. Here are 20 of Malaysia’s finest startups that we expect will make it big in 2015.

news.title: 我不翅了！
news.description: 护鯊行动则选择了Wedding.com.my作为合作伙伴。「他们在这方面可说是佼佼者，上至婚礼场地，下至装饰配件等都有一定的人脉。」吕子伯认为，透过wedding.com.my，可以教育更多的新人，实现婚宴零鱼翅。

news.title: V-day Challenge 2015 to Create Awareness on Shark Conservation
news.description: The V-Day Challenge 2015 (#VDAY2015) programme, which aims at creating awareness on the conservation of sharks, will seek to refrain shark-fin soup from being served at wedding dinners.

news.title: A Wedding Site And A Shark Conservation Org Join Forces For An Ultimate Mission
news.description: Wedding.com.my aims to raise awareness under their platform to encourage their fans (and over 200,000 members) to not feature shark fin soup at wedding banquets.

news.title: Pelancaran #VDAY2015 oleh Global Shark Conservation NGO dan Wedding.com.my
news.description: Global Shark Conversation NGO WildAid Shark Savers bekerjasama dengan Wedding.com.my untuk melancarkan V-Day Challenge 2015 (#VDAY2015) yang bertujuan untuk mengatakan “tidak” kepada sup sirip ikan yu.

news.title: Enlinea Aims be South-East Asia's Leading Female Portals Operator
news.description: With that in mind, MSC Malaysia company Enlinea Sdn. Bhd., aims operate South-East Asia's leading female portals, which cater to the three main stages of women's lives - namely their wedding, young motherhood and family home life.

news.title: Vying for A Slice of The Cake - Empowering Working Women Through One Platform
news.description: Two websites, one for the working woman and the other started by two men, aim to help couples plan the perfect wedding.

news.title: From Marriage to Motherhood, A Startup Aims to Do It All
news.description: IF you’ve ever wondered how strongly personal developments can influence one’s entrepreneurial journey, just take a look at the team behind Wedding.com.my.

news.title: WEDDING.COM.MY – Entrepreneurial Insights
news.description: Ideascrunch featured startup today is Wedding.com.my, an ultimate wedding guide to all things relating to weddings in Malaysia. Effortlessly find wedding dresses, hotels, to wedding car rentals and everything you would ever need for your dream wedding!

news.title: 17 Startups in Asia that Caught Our Eye
news.description: Here’s our newest round-up of the featured startups on our site this week. If you have startup tips or story suggestions, feel free to email us or tell us about your startup on this form. Any juicy tech news tips go here. Enjoy this week’s list!

news.title: New Malaysian Site to Make Wedding Arrangements Painlessly
news.description: Most people dream of a luxurious and grand wedding involving beautiful decorations, floor length gowns, tuxedos, lovely music, wine and delicious foods. Weddings in real life are costly business. The bride and groom are ready to pay for the best but unfortunately, they do not always get the best even after paying the price.

news.title: This Malaysian Site Wants To Clean Up The Ugly Side Of The Wedding Industry
news.description: What most don’t realize is the ugly underbelly of the wedding industry, where vendors all too often conjure up ways to make unwitting couples cough up as much cash as possible. And it is by no means a small amount of cash – weddings make up an impressive MYR$7 billion (US$2.2 billion) industry in Malaysia.

news.title: KL Wedding Expo 2014: Tying the Knot in Style
news.description: Organised by Harenet Communications Sdn Bhd, the wedding expo which is held every quarter, features a comprehensive range of wedding packages on offer both locally and abroad at special discounted prices to suit the budget of couples intending to exchange marital vows.

news.title: Wedding.com.my Lancar Enjin Carian Visual untuk Perkhawinan
news.description: Organised by Harenet Communications Sdn Bhd, the wedding expo which is held every quarter, features a comprehensive range of wedding packages on offer both locally and abroad at special discounted prices to suit the budget of couples intending to exchange marital vows.

news.title: Wedding.com.my
news.description: Wedding.com.my is the #1 wedding network in Malaysia to search for wedspiration and ideas for wedding planning. We offer couples a fun and inspiring experience to personalize and plan their wedding effectively.
